credentials: PHD 1995 Univ of California Los Angeles
department: School of Med & Pub Hlth ACAF
name: ELISE DAVIS

ratings.comment: Elise is incredibly knowledgeable in anatomy and wants to help you learn. She is an incredible professor and as long as you prepare for class you will get so much out of learning from Elise.

Don't have anything positive really to say about this class. Lecturers just throw all the content at you in a disorganized manner and expect you to be an expert on it without specifying what they expect from you on exams at all. Google taught me more than the 3 professors for this course did.

Out of the 3 anatomy professors, Elise was my least favorite. She wasn't as offering to help and when you would ask her she would get snippy about it. Her lectures weren't as well organized as the other 2 professors. DO NOT BUY THE BOOK
She's the best!!!!!! She taught the hardest section of the class and made it really tolerable. She is super nice and really cares about everyone!! TAKE THIS CLASS WITH HER!!
